content: **knitted top in drops safran the piece is worked bottom up with lace pattern and i-cord edging sizes s - xxxl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern e-356 yarn group a ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **yarn** drops safran from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 150-200-200-200-250-250 g colour 22 light brown **needles** drops circular needle size 3 5 mm length 60 cm drops circular needle size 2 5 mm length 60 cm drops double pointed needles size 2 5 mm **knitting gauge** 24 stitches in width and 32 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
